articles.title: Russian Govt. Offers Food to DPRK
articles.content:
Russian Govt. Offers Food to DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Food offered by the government of the Russian Federation to the DPRK through the World Food Programme arrived at Nampho Port on Feb. 26.
					 The food aid by the government of the Russian Federation will contribute to boosting the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok Meets European Politicians
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets European Politicians 
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Tuesday met and had a talk with a delegation of politicians from various political parties of Europe led by Chief Executive Officer of Inter Mediate Jonathan Powell, former Downing Street Chief of Staff to Prime Minister Tony Blair.

articles.title: European Politicians Here
articles.content:
European Politicians Here
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNAA) -- A delegation of politicians from various political parties of Europe led by Chief Executive Officer of Inter Mediate Jonathan Powell, former Downing Street Chief of Staff to Prime Minister Tony Blair, arrived here Tuesday.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Leaves for Laos
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Leaves for Laos
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Ministry of People's Security of the DPRK led by Minister Choe Pu Il left here to visit Laos on Tuesday.

articles.title: Mongolian Delegation Here
articles.content:
Mongolian Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Mongolia led by Department Director G. Battungalag arrived here Tuesday.

articles.title: Mongolian FM Delegation Pays Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Mongolian FM Delegation Pays Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Mongolia visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Tuesday.
					 Members of the delegation laid bouquets before the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Seminar of Social Scientists on 70-Day Campaign of Loyalty Held
articles.content:
Seminar of Social Scientists on Importance and Significance of 70-Day Campaign of Loyalty Held
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- A seminar of social scientists took place at the Academy of Social Sciences on the importance and significance of the 70-day campaign of loyalty on Tuesday.
					 Present at the seminar were Ri Hye Jong, president of the academy, officials concerned, and teachers, researchers, lecturers and journalists in the field of science, education, press and preservation of revolutionary relics and party official training institutions.
					
					 Presented there were papers which explained and proved the importance and significance of the 70-day campaign of loyalty scientifically and theoretically.
					
					 Speakers stressed that for more than seventy years since an inaugural congress of the WPK it has steadily developed into the party of the leader and the revolutionary party of Juche in which the oneness and continuity of the ideology and leadership are firmly provided with its congresses as momenta and brought about great changes in carving out the destiny of the people and improving their living and thus ushered in golden days of the country's prosperity.
					
					 The 70-day campaign of loyalty is a general mobilization one for bolstering up the Juche-oriented revolutionary forces in every way and giving the fullest play to the self-development, and a great one bringing about radical changes, the speakers noted.
					
					 They expressed their determinations to make positive contributions to creating the spirit of fresh times and heroic struggle trait in the day-and-night advance of the 70-day campaign for greeting the Seventh Party Congress.

articles.title: State Commendations to Workers, Technicians and Officials of Sangwon Cement Complex
articles.content:
State Commendations to Workers, Technicians and Officials of Sangwon Cement Complex
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- State commendations were awarded to workers, technicians and officials of the Sangwon Cement Complex in the DPRK.
					 The title of Labor Hero went to Kim Myong Ho, work-team head of the Cement Workshop, and Rim Pong Un, work-team head of the Calcinating Workshop, and Kim Jong Il Youth Honor Prize to Jo Son Guk, tunneling worker of Pit No. 1 of the Samchong Mine, Pak Song Hyok, tunneling worker of Jeryong Pit of the Hwachon Coal Mine, and Pak Hyon Hui, controller of Ore Crushing Workshop No. 1 of the Sangwon Limestone Mine.
					
					 The title of Merited Technician went to one person, the title of Merited Miner to one person, the title of Merited Coal Miner to two persons, Order of National Flag First Class to 16 persons, Order of Labor to 21 persons, Order of National Flag Second Class to 296 persons, Order of National Flag Third Class to 451 persons and Medal of Merit to 501 persons.
					
					 Last year officials and workers of the Sangwon Cement Complex broke the best year production record to demonstrate the revolutionary spirit and mettle of the heroic Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's workers.
					
					 A relevant decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK was issued on February 26.

articles.title: Pyongyang Replete with Spirit of General Offensive
articles.content:
Pyongyang Replete with Spirit of General Offensive
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang, the capital city of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, is leading the whole country in the 70-day campaign launched to greet the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea with unprecedented achievements. 
					 Seen in different parts of the city are such slogans as "Let us usher in a golden age in building a thriving nation this year when the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea is to be held!" and "Let all of us become honorable victors in the 70-day campaign of loyalty!" and loudspeaker cars conducting brisk agitation activities. 
					
					 The Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex, the East Pyongyang Thermal Power Plant and other electricity producers in the city strive to display their capability to the full.
					
					 Also achievements are reported from coal fields in the area of Kangdong and engine service brigades. In six days after the start of the campaign, the Kangdong Area Coal-mining Complex carried out its daily quota at 135 percent and the Pyongyang Railway Bureau over-fulfilled its freight transport plan 101 percent. 
					
					 Meanwhile, co-op farms in the city set about proper overhaul of farm machines, implements and pumps after finishing the production and carriage of manure to the field.
					
					 The Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill, the Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory and other industrial establishments have turned out in an emulation drive to put production processes on a modern basis, localize raw materials and equipment and produce more world-competitive famous goods.
					
					 Besides, a brisk work is going on to develop Pyongyang into a more splendid, world-class city, as the centre of Songun culture, and carry out a lot of construction projects at a fast tempo and in a qualitative way.

articles.title: Field Medical Service Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Field Medical Service Brisk in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Health workers of the DPRK launched a field medical service as part of the 70-day campaign to significantly greet the upcoming 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 In Pyongyang those from the Pyongyang Medical College Hospital of Kim Il Sung University and Kim Man Yu Hospital started their medical service at the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill and the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex. They are now conducting medical checkup and treatment among employees.
					
					 Meanwhile, medical teams from the General Dental Hospital under the Ministry of Public Health and the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital are active in the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex and the Jangchon Vegetable Co-op Farm in Sadong District, Pyongyang.
					
					 Those units conducting field medical service also include the Ministry of Public Health Skin-disease Preventive Centre, Pyongyang Ophthalmic Hospital and Pyongyang Municipal People's Hospital No. 2.
					
					 Such field medical service was launched in provinces of the country, including North and South Phyongan and South Hamgyong provinces.

articles.title: Successes Made in Updating Power Control System
articles.content:
Successes Made in Developing Electricity Control System
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Big efforts are paid to converting the electricity control system into an electricity-saving one in the DPRK.
					 In this regard, Ju Jong Sil, deputy director of the Electric Power Industry Research Institute under the Ministry of Electric Power Industry, told KCNA:
					
					 A project to relay transmission lines was completed across the country, thus reducing the loss of power in transmission.
					
					 Meanwhile, production processes at the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex and Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex have been equipped with advanced reactive power compensation devices and frequency converters, which leads to the improvement of productive efficiency.
					
					 The production and consumption of electricity has been put under integrated real-time management. CNC-based load power control system, remote-control terminal and card watt-hour meter have been widely introduced at industrial establishments and other units.
					
					 The Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea recently issued the joint calls, one of them is "Let us definitely convert the electricity control system of the country into an electricity-saving one!"

articles.title: Sci-Tech Complex Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
articles.content:
Sci-Tech Complex Draws Endless Stream of Visitors

					
						 
					 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Nearly 300,000 persons have visited the Sci-Tech Complex since it was inaugurated on Jan. 1 this year.
					The number of visitors reached more than 5,000, at least 10,000 at the maximum every day.
					
					Information service at the complex is drawing the attention of scientists, technicians, educationists and experts.
					
					The number of visitors to e-libraries is on the daily increase, reaching almost double the number in the early period of service. Attracting visitors are new book reading hall which houses new foreign scientific and technological books and magazines dealing with 34 sectors available in more than ten languages.
					
					There is growing interest in new books among university students. Working people and school youth and children are studying hard with computers in reading halls on each floor including the main reading hall on the second floor.
					
					The reading room for children, e-library for students and animation file reading rooms are very popular among youngsters.
					
					The number of visitors to tele-lecture rooms is on the steady increase. It is now quadruple that in the early period of service.
					
					There is an increasing number of visitors to the question-answer room providing service not only to those coming to the complex but also to learners across the country through a computer network.
					
					The complex arranges various programs at academic symposium hall, temporary scientific and technological exhibition and intellectual products exhibition. Besides, it offers various scientific and technological tours.
					
					The hall dealing with the development of science and technology, ultra-modern science and technology hall, scientific pursuit hall, application science and technology hall and six other scientific and technological exhibitions and the outdoor scientific and technological exhibition consisting of future energy area and scientific amusement area are crowded with visitors.

articles.title: Production of Saplings Increases for Spring Tree Planting Campaign
articles.content:
Production of Saplings Increases for Spring Tree Planting Campaign 
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- The nurseries across the country are over-fulfilling their quotas for the production of saplings necessary for the spring tree planting campaign this year.
					 The Central Nursery of the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection raised tens of millions of saplings of good species including Pinus strobes to send them to different units across the country.
					
					 Working people in the forestry management stations in Tokchon City, Phyongwon, Yangdok, Thaechon, Hongwon and Toksong counties and many other cities and counties built nurseries operating with less land and manpower and have honored their plans for increased production of saplings.
					
					 Officials and employees of the Pyoksong County Forestry Management Station boosted the production of healthy saplings.
					
					 Sapling producers in Kanggye City raised more than ten million saplings to ensure successful spring tree-planting.

articles.title: Tree-Planting Day Marked
articles.content:
Tree-Planting Day Marked
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the Central Youth Hall Tuesday to mark the 70th anniversary of the Tree-planting Day which marks the start of tree-planting campaign by President Kim Il Sung.
					 The President climbed Moran Hill on March 2, Juche 35 (1946) and unrolled a far-reaching plan for turning the mountains of the country badly damaged under the Japanese colonial rule into a thickly wooded paradise of the people.
					
					 The DPRK has since marked this day as the Tree-planting Day.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Yang Hyong Sop, the chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and officials of the working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions.
					
					 A report was made by Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK.
					
					 He recalled that after kindling the torch of the above-said campaign after the country's liberation the President planted many trees on Munsu Hill and took steps for creating forests in a big way and successfully conserving forests throughout the country. 
					
					 The President issued an order of the Military Commission related to the afforestation and took special measures unprecedented in the human history of wars including the step for drawing up the regulations for afforestation and forest conservation during the Fatherland Liberation War, the reporter said, and went on:
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il led the work to carry out the President's far-reaching plan and devoted his all to adding shine to the new history of creating thick woodland out of his patriotism.
					
					 The desire of the great leaders is coming true under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The reporter called on everyone to turn out as one in the work for creating forests and conserving them and bring about a fresh turn in the work to turn the country into a thick woodland and greenery this year.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Blasts Reckless Remarks Made by Spokesman for S. Korean Ministry of Unification
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Blasts Reckless Remarks Made by Spokesman for S. Korean Ministry of Unification
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the south Korean puppet Ministry of Unification said at a news conference on Feb. 22 that the issue of concluding a peace treaty in the Korean Peninsula is not the one between the DPRK and the U.S. but south Korea should be "a main player."
					 He parroted someone's words that "there may be various discussions on the denuclearization, conclusion of the peace treaty and others but the government's position is that discussion on denuclearization is priority as it had already clarified."
					
					 His remarks clearly reflect the miserable position of the puppet group seized with uneasiness and contradiction, afraid that for its blind pursuance of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK south Korea may become a servant without a master.
					
					 Great irony is that the south Korean puppet forces who are no more than war servants of the U.S. are talking about the main player in replacing the Armistice Agreement which has existed for more than 60 years.
					
					 As well known to the world, the AA concluded on July 27, 1953 was signed by the DPRK and the U.S.
					
					 The AA was adopted as an international legal document thanks to the DPRK's initiative and stubborn struggle for providing a legal foundation for establishing peace-keeping mechanism after the Korean war. It called for resolving the issue of Korea independently and peacefully free from any foreign interference and building lasting peace-keeping mechanism in the Korean Peninsula, not temporary ceasefire.
					
					 The U.S., however, systematically rendered the AA defunct and persistently shunned the DPRK's series of fair and aboveboard proposals to conclude a peace treaty for a definite end to the Korean war.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. which holds wartime operation control over the south Korean army and manages the AA.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces have allowed the conversion of south Korea into the biggest arsenal of nuclear weapons in the Far East as a shock brigade of the U.S. for a war for more than six decades and ceaselessly staged war exercises, big and small, against the DPRK under various codenames.
					
					 Still now, they are talking about "firm commitments" to the U.S. over the DPRK's launch of the earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4. They have introduced U.S. F-22s and nuclear capable B-52s into south Korea, offering it as a theater of U.S. nuclear war.
					
					 Peace will never settle in the Korean Peninsula as long as the south Korean puppet group is hell-bent on confrontation with the compatriots in the north as the shock brigade of the U.S. for carrying out its scenario for stifling the DPRK.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces would be well advised to stop running riot, well aware that they are no more than slaves of the American master as they have not an iota of sovereignty.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Marks Day of March First Popular Uprising
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Marks Day of March First Popular Uprising
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an editorial dedicated to the 97th anniversary of the March First Popular Uprising calls on the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad to turn out in patriotic struggle to pave a wide avenue to independent reunification under the uplifted banner of national independence against outsiders. 
					 The editorial goes on:
					
					 The March First Popular Uprising was a nationwide anti-Japanese patriotic resistance in which the Korean nation rose to protest the Japanese imperialists' harsh colonial rule in order to take back the usurped sovereignty of the Korean nation.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists illegally occupied Korea early in the 20th century and enforced mediaeval, colonial and fascist rule and deprived the Korean nation of all rights and imposed upon the Korean people the destiny of statelessness.
					
					 Bitter anger and resentment of the Korean nation erupted on March 1, 1919 as a nationwide anti-Japanese resistance.
					
					 The protestors indomitably fought against the brutal suppression by the Japanese imperialist army and police who wielded rifles and bayonets. The anti-Japanese struggle arose even in the overseas Koreans residential areas.
					
					 The March First Popular Uprising left a serious lesson that the struggle of the popular masses should be led by an outstanding leader if sovereignty of the nation and independence of the country are to be achieved and that people should fight the aggressors armed to the teeth with the armed forces.
					
					 Though nearly a century passed since the popular uprising, outside forces persist in the criminal moves to invade Korea and the national sovereignty of the south Korean people is cruelly violated.
					
					 The editorial calls on all the fellow countrymen to hold fast to the three charters for national reunification and the north-south declarations associated with the noble lives of the peerlessly great men as programmes for reunification common to the nation and turn out in the drive for implementing them.

articles.title: Socialism Will Always Win: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Socialism Will Always Win: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- March 1 marks the 23rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Abuses of Socialism Are Intolerable". 
					 The work is an important one as it deals a heavy blow at the imperialists and renegades of socialism malignantly slandering socialism, the ideal of mankind, as "totalitarian", "barracks-like" and "administrative and commanding" and proves the inevitability of the victory of socialism.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in an article in this regard:
					
					 23 years since the publication of the work are a glorious period in which Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses has grown to be an invincible fortress and is cherished by the Korean people as their life and soul.
					
					 The imperialists have become ever more undisguised in their moves to isolate and suffocate Korean-style socialism and make it degenerate and unstable and a danger of war has always persisted in this land.
					
					 Even under the difficult situation where the people had to tighten their belts more than ever before, the socialist system of the DPRK has always protected their destiny, being responsible for it, and popular policies of the Workers' Party of Korea and state have been invariably enforced.
					
					 All service personnel and people have cherished the immutable truth that there are eternal happiness and bright future when they firmly preserve and consolidate socialism of Juche provided and glorified by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Socialism always remains the eternal ideal of mankind and the irresistible trend of the times. Socialism will always stay just as the people will always live on this land. Socialism is sure to always triumph just as they will always emerge victorious.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Dismisses "North's Military Provocation" Touted by S. Korean Puppet Forces
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Dismisses "North's Military Provocation" Touted by S. Korean Puppet Forces
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNAA) -- The south Korean puppet forces' floating of the fiction about "north's military provocation" is nothing but a deceptive artifice to cover up their true colors as provocateurs, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article.
					 It is their long harbored ambition to provoke a war against the north, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The "north Korea policy" of the south Korean conservative authorities is, in essence, a war policy to realize their ambition for invading the north in collusion with outsiders.
					
					 It is well known that traitor Park Geun Hye appointed military confrontation maniacs to important posts as soon as she became boss of Chongwadae and incited military confrontation with the north, pursuant to the U.S. hostile policy toward it.
					
					 No sooner had Park taken office than staged Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises against the north together with the U.S. imperialist aggression forces.
					
					 The puppet forces fully revealed their war hysteria through subsequent large-scale joint military drills such as Ulji Freedom Guardian.
					
					 This clearly proves the criminal nature of the group of traitors who are only keen to provoke a war against the north in utter disregard of the destiny of the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 It is no more than a daydream for them to realize their ambition for invading the north while pursuing a sinister aim through the floating of sheer fiction about "military provocation" from the north.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group will face only a disgraceful destruction if it persists in reckless military provocations, failing to come to its senses despite the warnings of the DPRK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Confrontational Maniacs of Floating Rumor about "Terrorist Attack from North"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Confrontational Maniacs of Floating Rumor about "Terrorist Attack from North"
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- The director of the puppet "Intelligence Service" of south Korea recently submitted to the "National Assembly" a "report on the receipt of information that the north is preparing for terrorism".
					 The chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff talked volumes about the "possible terrorist attack from the north" before his stooges and called for a "stern punishment" and "strong retaliation".
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says:
					
					 What they uttered is ridiculous, indeed.
					
					 By floating the sheer fiction about "north's terrorist attack" the puppet forces are seeking to justify their criminal scenario to ignite a war against the north and find a pretext for fascistizing the south Korean society.
					
					 It was none other than the south Korean warmongers who frequently carried out operations to lure and abduct DPRK citizens in other countries and made attempts to "bring down statues" in a bid to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, sparking off the bitter anger of all Koreans.
					
					 Recently the Park Geun Hye regime, obsessed with the confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north, introduced into south Korea the special operation forces of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces specializing in terrorism against sovereign states to commit such thrice-cursed crimes as "beheading operation," pushing the situation in the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a war.
					
					 The DPRK will never let this group of traitors go scot-free as it hurls mud at the compatriots and threatens the destiny of the nation in order to prolong their dirty remaining days.
					
					 The south Korean group of traitors would be well advised to stop its reckless acts, bearing in mind what high price they will have to pay for such poor farce.

articles.title: Koreans in U.S. Stage Action in Solidarity with S. Korean People's Struggle
articles.content:
Koreans in U.S. Stage Action in Solidarity with S. Korean People's Struggle 
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Koreans in the U.S. staged an action in Los Angeles on Feb. 27 in solidarity with the south Korean people's 4th all-out action against the Park Geun Hye group's unpopular fascist rule.
					 Speakers condemned the crimes committed by the Park group such as the "Intelligence Service's" illegal interference in election, disbandment of the Unified Progressive Party and the ferry Sewol disaster.
					
					 They expressed resentment at Park who once again insulted the victims of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army through the humiliating "agreement" with Japan and is pushing forward the system of introducing the "state-compiled history textbooks" to justify her pro-Japanese acts.
					
					 They noted that Park's move to pass the "bill on preventing terrorism" at any cost is the last-ditch effort made by her for fear of death for her crimes after the tenure of her office.
					
					 They said that they would struggle for the fall of the Park regime.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Submission to Japan Slammed by S. Korean Students
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Submission to Japan Slammed by S. Korean Students
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- The south Korean CBS made public  the results of the opinion poll conducted among students of junior and senior high schools on February 29 on the "agreement" on the issue of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army concluded between the south Korean authorities and Japan.
					 According to them, 85 percent of them said "no" to the "agreement."
					
					 Students urged the south Korean authorities to immediately settle the issue of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army and take measures against Japan's moves to grab Tok Islets and distortion of history.

articles.title: U.S. Reporter Terms S. Korean Conservative Group's "Bill on Preventing Terrorism" as Evil ne
articles.content:
U.S. Reporter Terms S. Korean Conservative Group's "Bill on Preventing Terrorism" as Evil One
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- A reporter of the U.S. weekly magazine The Nation posted on website an article on Feb. 24 denouncing the  south Korean conservative group for attempting to fabricate the "bill on preventing terrorism" as an evil one, according to the south Korean internet paper Asia Economy.
					 The reporter said that members of the opposition parties of south Korea were holding a seminar to prevent the passage of the bill that the Park Geun Hye regime promoted under the pretext of "provocation from the north".
					
					 The reporter referred to the injustice of every provision of the bill, noting that if the bill is instituted, the Intelligence Service will have the right to illegally watch politicians, civilians and even foreigners.
					
					 Korea remains divided into the south and the north, but the threat of terrorism does not come from this, the reporter added.
					
					 The reporter also carried an article critical of the Park Geun Hye group's crackdown on workers in December last year.

articles.title: Crucial Statement of KPA Supreme Command Supported
articles.content:
Crucial Statement of KPA Supreme Command Supported
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China on February 26 made public a statement supporting the crucial statement of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army which clarified the will to mercilessly foil all the provocations of the hostile forces.
					 All the Koreans in China of the Zhongnan Regional Association are fully determined to turn out as one in the final battle against the U.S. to devotedly defend the supreme headquarters of the revolution and frustrate the U.S. and south Korean authorities' anti-DPRK moves and achieve national reunification in response to the crucial statement of the KPA Supreme Command, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group of traitors is malignantly decrying the nuclear deterrence and success in space development, treasures common to the nation, and busy introducing nuclear war means of the U.S., its master, to bring a nuclear disaster to the nation.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean authorities should take the final option: Whether to face a merciless punishment or make an apology and put the situation under control, though belatedly.
					
					 The U.S. should bear in mind that it is the only way out to opt for concluding a peace treaty with the DPRK.

articles.title: Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Take Place in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Take Place in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Seminars on exploits of leader Kim Jong Il took place in Mexico, Peru and Sri Lanka from Feb. 9 to 16.
					 Speakers including the president of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and the chairman of the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea lauded Kim Jong Il for developing in depth the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung into the guiding idea in the era of independence and firmly defending the country's sovereignty and national dignity and the socialist cause from the imperialist allied forces' moves for stifling the DPRK by pursuing the original Songun politics.
					
					 The secretary general of the Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said:
					
					 The DPRK could demonstrate the dignity of the socialist power, independent power and military power envied by the world thanks to the outstanding and tested leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the great leaders.
					
					 Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is the great idea to be accepted and followed by all countries and peoples of the world.
					
					 The chairman of the Committee of Self-Reliance Studies in Sri Lanka stressed that the DPRK is more highly demonstrating the dignity of the invincible socialist power under the leadership of HE Kim Jong Un who is following the intention of the preceding leaders.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Observed by Russian Media
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Observed by Russian Media
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Russian newspapers and news service carried special write-ups from Feb. 4 to 16 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 The newspaper Komsomolskaya Pravda carried articles illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il and his photos.
					
					 The newspaper Pravda Primoriya in an article titled "Peerless patriot" accompanied with a photo of leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un standing together said that Kim Jong Il, possessed of the warm love for the country and people as his inborn disposition, devoted his noble life to the building of a prosperous country.
					
					 The newspaper Nidjegorodskaya Pravda allotted one whole page to an article titled "The Day of the Shining Star" illustrated with a photo of Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The newspaper Pri Armurskiye Vedomostsi carried articles titled "Music and Kim Jong Il" and "Person who regarded the people as heaven".
					
					 The DV-Ros News Service, dealing with Songun leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il, reported that he is the peerless sun of Songun who defended socialism and paved the road of national prosperity with his Songun politics in the period when the DPRK faced difficulties.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Is Eternal Sun of Songun Korea: Brazilian Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Is Eternal Sun of Songun Korea: Brazilian Organizations
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Brazilian organizations posted on their websites special write-ups illustrated with photos of leader Kim Jong Il on Feb. 16 and 18 on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 The Brazilian Committee for Remembering Leader Kim Jong Il posted the following article titled "Eternal sun of Songun Korea":
					
					 Kim Jong Il is the eternal sun of socialist Korea who defended socialism and destiny of the nation with Songun.
					
					 He led the struggle for safeguarding socialism to the brilliant victory with his Songun revolutionary leadership while carrying forward the idea and line on attaching importance to the arms and military affairs advanced by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The rosy future of thriving Korea will be brought earlier thanks to the tireless Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il who turned the DPRK into a politico-ideological power and a military power with his original Songun politics and provided the eternal foundation for building a thriving nation.
					
					 The Songun revolutionary cause will emerge only victorious and he will be alive as the eternal sun of Songun as the DPRK is led by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea posted a similar article.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits and Greatness Lauded by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits and Greatness Lauded by Foreign Newspapers
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers dedicated special write-ups illustrated with a portrait of smiling leader Kim Jong Il and his photos to the Day of the Shining Star (his birth anniversary).
					 The Feb. 16th issue of the Thai newspaper Xing San Daily in an article titled "Ushering in fresh era of independent reunification" said that Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il devoted all his efforts to the accomplishment of the reunification cause of the Korean nation.
					
					 On the same day a Venezuelan newspaper said in an article titled "Whole life for future" that Kim Jong Il's career is the one in which he firmly adhered to the principle of attaching more importance to the future than today. It noted that his outstanding trait as a great man can be found in the fact that he made an arduous journey for bringing earlier the rosy future.
					
					 The Feb. 17th issue of the Kuwaiti newspaper Kuwait Times praised the exploits of Kim Jong Il who was possessed of matchless pluck and iron will and firmly defended the country's sovereignty and dignity and socialism with his invincible Songun politics.
					
					 The Feb. 12th issue of the Ugandan newspaper Sun Rise in an article titled "Attraction" dealt with the memoirs of prominent figures such as Dmitri Yazov, former minister of Defence of the Soviet Union, who was attracted by the greatness of Kim Jong Il, illustrious commander possessed of outstanding wisdom and military stratagem, after meeting him.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Support Joint Calls of WPK
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Support Joint Calls of WPK
 Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- The Swiss preparatory committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on Feb. 22 fully supporting the joint calls made by the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and sincerely hoping that its Seventh Congress would prove to be a glorious one of victors.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The joint calls appealed to the WPK, all the servicepersons and people to direct primary efforts to implementing the behests of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il under the Songun leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un and make signal achievements on the threshold of the 7th Party Congress.
					
					 The joint calls serve as a strategic landmark of historical significance in advancing socialist Korea, demonstrating before the world the dignity of a politico-ideological power, matchless military power and youth power without an equal in the world.
					
					 They also serve as a bright blueprint for building the best socialism, the most highly civilized in the world.

articles.title: Acto central por 70o aniversario de Dia de Reforestacion
articles.content:
Acto central por 70o aniversario de Dia de Reforestacion 
Pyongyang, primero de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia primero en la Casa Central de la Juventud el acto central por el 70o aniversario del Dia de Reforestacion iniciado por el Presidente Kim Il Sung. 
					El 2 de marzo del 35 (1946) de la Era Juche, el Presidente subio a la colina Moran, donde planto arboles con el gran proposito de convertir en el paraiso del pueblo las montanas y rios de la patria devastados por la dominacion colonial del imperialismo japones. 
					
					La Republica Popular Democratica de Corea celebra ese dia como Dia de Reforestacion. 
					
					En el acto central participaron Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Yang Hyong Sop, el secretario jefe del Comite del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en la Ciudad de Pyongyang, los funcionarios de las entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, etc.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros. 
					
					Una vez liberada la patria, el Presidente tomo la iniciativa del movimiento de repoblacion forestal, dijo el informante y continuo:
					
					El Presidente planto muchos arboles en la colina Munsu y tomo las medidas para formar los bosques y cuidarlos bien. 
					
					En el periodo de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, dio la orden de la Comision Militar sobre la repoblacion forestal, hizo elaborar el reglamento sobre la formacion y proteccion forestales y tomo otras medidas especiales no vistas en la historia de guerras. 
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il con mas noble patriotismo apoyo al frente el gran proposito del Presidente y dedico todo lo suyo por continuar la nueva historia de reforestacion. 
					
					Los nobles deseos de los grandes Lideres antecesores se realizan por la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					El informante llamo a todos a levantarse como un solo hombre en la formacion y proteccion forestales para registrar este ano un nuevo cambio en la reforestacion del pais.

articles.title: Efectuado seminario sobre campana de fidelidad de 70 dias
articles.content:
Efectuado seminario sobre campana de fidelidad de 70 dias
Pyongyang, primero de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia primero en la Academia de Ciencias Sociales el seminario de rama de ciencias sociales sobre la importancia y el significado de la campana de fidelidad de 70 dias.
					Tomaron parte alli Ri Hye Jong, presidenta de dicha academia, funcionarios de ramas concernientes, profesores, investigadores, conferenciantes y periodistas de sectores de ciencia, educacion, prensa e informacion, de rama de la historia revolucionaria y de formacion de funcionarios partidistas.
					
					En el acto quedaron publicadas las disertaciones que argumentaron de manera cientifico-teorica la importancia y el significado de susodicha campana. 
					
					Los oradores senalaron que durante mas de 70 anos que datan del congreso de fundacion del partido, el PTC se ha intensificado y desarrollado sin parar como el partido del lider, el revolucionario del Juche donde fueron garantizados con firmeza la unicidad y la continuidad de la idea y la direccion tomando por punto de partida los congresos partidistas. Apuntaron que tambien logro grandes cambios en el destino y la vida del pueblo y vino extendiendo la era dorada de la prosperidad de la patria.
					
					Subrayaron que la actual campana de fidelidad deviene la batalla de movilizacion general y de grandes transformaciones que fortalecera por todos los medios las autoctonas fuerzas revolucionarias y manifestara al maximo el espiritu de autofortalecimiento.
					
					Manifestaron sus decisiones de hacer aporte a crear nuevo espiritu de la epoca e impetu de lucha heroica en la campana de 70 dias hacia el VII Congreso del PTC al tener una compresion clara sobre la importancia y el significado de la presente campana de fidelidad de 70 dias.

articles.title: ACNC condena tonteria impertinente de criado colonial
articles.content:
ACNC condena tonteria impertinente de criado colonial
Pyongyang, primero de marzo (ACNC) -- En la conferencia de prensa concedida el pasado dia 22 de febrero, el vocero del Ministerio de Unificacion del Sur de Corea lanzo disparates de que la concertacion del convenio de paz de la Peninsula Coreana no es el tema entre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y EE.UU. y que ellos deben ser "sujeto principal" para resolver el problema.
					"Surgen varias discusiones sobre la desnuclearizacion, el convenio de paz y otros problemas, pero es prioritario el debate sobre la desnuclearizacion como el gobierno ya aclaro", asi repitio como papagayo la palabra de alguien.
					
					Tales disparates reflejan bien la situacion miserable de la banda titere surcoreana que esta inquieta por la preocupacion de ser abandonada al cabo de seguir al pie de la letra la estrategia hostil anti-RPDC de EE.UU. 
					
					Es una gran absurdidad que los titeres surcoreanos, criado belico de su amo gringo hablan del "sujeto principal" del Acuerdo de Armisticio perdurado mas de 60 anos.
					
					Como ya sabe todo el mundo, la RPDC y EE.UU. son firmantes el dicho acuerdo concertado el 27 de julio de 1953.
					
					Gracias a la lucha iniciativa y tesonera de la RPDC para preparar el fundamento juridico del establecimiento de las relaciones pacificas en la posguerra, el acuerdo fue firmado como documento basado en la ley internacional, previendo no cesar temporalmente la beligerancia sino resolver de manera independiente y pacifica el problema de Corea sin intervencion de las fuerzas exteriores y establecer el firme sistema por la paz en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Sin embargo, EE.UU. convirtio sistematicamente el acuerdo de armisticio en letras muertas y nego persistentemente las reiteradas propuestas imparciales de la RPDC de discutir el tema de concertar el convenio de paz para acabar  formalmente con la guerra coreana.
					
					En efecto, EE.UU. es la parte interesada que tiene el mando de operaciones en el tiempo de guerra del ejercito titere surcoreano y administra el acuerdo de armisticio.
					
					Durante mas de 60 anos pasados, los titeres surcoreanos, actuando como brigada de choque de guerra de EE.UU., convirtieron el suelo surcoreano en el maximo arsenal nuclear del Extremo Oriente y han venido realizando cada ano con EE.UU. los ejercicios de guerra anti-RPDC de todo tipo.
					
					Hoy en dia tambien, ellos hablan ruidosamente sobre la "firme promesa" con EE.UU., cuestionando el lanzamiento de nuestro satelite Kwangmyongsong-4 y convierten la Peninsula Coreana en el campo de guerra nuclear de EE.UU. permitiendo volar los aviones de combate Stealth F-22 y bombarderos estrategicos B-52 de EE.UU. en el cielo del suelo surcoreano.
					
					Nunca puede reinar la paz en la Peninsula Coreana mientras la banda titere surcoreana se entregue a la confrontacion fratricida siendo brigada de choque de la ejecucion de las maniobras de aplastamiento anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos deben actuar con prudencia al conocer bien su estado como sirviente colonial sin soberania elemental.
